source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_00<tab>Seww would have you turn the tables on the Serpent Reavers.
target: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のセェウは、冒険者に倒してほしい者がいるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_01<tab>In a bid to weaken the forces of the Coral Tridents, Seww asks that you launch a surprise attack on a vessel of their allies, the Serpent Reavers. Take one of Pahh's elbst to the disguised merchantman, and defeat drowned raiders until their leader comes forth to challenge you himself.
target: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_01<tab>セェウから、拿捕した商船に陣取る「海蛇の舌」の幹部を討伐するよう頼まれた。洋上の商船に乗り込んで、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209EB01 /var>」を3体討伐し、おびき寄せた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20AB501 /var>」を討伐しよう。洋上の商船へ行くためのエルブストは、ノォヴの育成地の「海獣使いのパァア」が手配してくれるそうだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the drowned seaman and demoralized the crew of the repurposed trading vessel. Return to Novv's Nursery and report to Seww.
target: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20AB501 /var>を討伐した。ノォヴの育成地の「セェウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_03<tab>Seww is pleased to hear of the Serpent Reaver officer's demise, and judges that the surviving pirates will need time to regroup from their sudden losses. The spawnling muses over the unenviable position of the tattooed thugs─despised by their own kin, and treated as lowly servants by the Sahagin─and expects that their thirst for violence will never truly be quenched.
target: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEQ_03<tab>セェウは、冒険者の活躍に満足したようだ。「海蛇の舌」は人とサハギン族、どちらの陣営からも蔑まれる存在。卑劣な手口を使う彼らに対し、セェウも強い嫌悪感を抱いているようだ。「海蛇の舌」が悪事を続ける限り、その討伐に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_TODO_00<tab>Defeat drowned raiders aboard the merchantman, then slay the drowned seaman when he appears.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_TODO_00洋上の商船にいるを3体討伐し
おびき寄せたを討伐

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_000<tab>If we are to weaken the thrushhhts of the Coral Tridentshhh, then we need also thin the rankshhh of their allies, the Shhherpent Reavers.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_000フスィーッ……「珊瑚の銛」の力を削ぐには、
奴らが操るヒレナシ、「海蛇の舌」とも戦う必要がある。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_001<tab>One of their shhhenior tactical officers is a-sea with a crew even as we shhhpeak.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_001そこで、洋上で獲物を探している、
「海蛇の舌」の船に乗り込み、幹部を始末してほしい。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_002<tab>They prowl the waters in a merchantman, posing as traders shhho as not to alert their prey to their true nature. But we are not shhho easily fooled.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_002「海蛇の舌」の連中は、拿捕した商船を、
海賊船として使っているからな……フスィーッ。
見た目に欺されず、奇襲するんだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_003<tab>Pshhh... Take an elbshhht, and shhhlip aboard the disguised pirate vessel. Your main target will come to you once you have shhhlain enough of his men.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_003フスィーッ……エルブストを使って、
商船に乗り込み、下っ端どもを叩きのめすんだぜ。
そうすりゃ、目当ての幹部が現れるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_004<tab>Board the Shhherpent Reavers' merchantman, and bring down the shhhenior officer. My shhhpawnbrother Pahh will lend you a shhheabeast for the tashhhk.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_004フスィーッ……「海蛇の舌」の商船に乗り込み、
奴らの幹部を始末してほしい。
「海獣使いのパァア」に話し、エルブストに乗っていけ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_TAMER01376_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Hunting Ssserpent Reavers today? My elbssst will ssspeed you to their shhhip.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_TAMER01376_000_010フスィーッ……洋上の商船に行きたいのか？
エルブストは、今日も張り切っている。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_Q1_000_000<tab>Ride the elbst to the pirates' merchantman?
target: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_Q1_000_000<tab>エルブストに乗り「洋上の商船」へ行きますか？

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_020<tab>Pshhh... The officer is dead? Well done. I imagine the Reavers are not accushhhtomed to being the <var 1A 02 /var>target<var 1A 01 /var> of a shhhurprise attack─they will need to return to port to recover and regroup.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_020フスィーッ……よくやってくれたな。
幹部を失ったとなれば、態勢を立て直すため、
船も港に戻らざるを得ないだろう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_021<tab>These tattooed pirates... The shhhorewalkers despise them, and my people treat them little better than shhhlaves. It is little wonder that they act with shhhuch unreshhhtrained cruelty.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_SEWW_000_021「海蛇の舌」はヒレナシ勢力からも嫌われ、
サハギン族からも下僕のように扱われている。
フスィーッ……まったく、救いようのない下衆な連中だ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>A Serpent Reaver officer comes forth to challenge you!

TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_BALLOON_000_030I'll leave yer guts
fer the gulls, whelp!
target:
TEXT_BANSAH307_01406_BALLOON_000_030よくも部下たちを…
捕まえて縛り首だっ！
